steps.title: Draw two adjacent squares.
steps.content: Draw two adjacent squares.

steps.title: Mark two dots on the middle line.
steps.content: Mark two dots on the middle line.

steps.title: Draw a slanted "S" with the end connected to the upper dot.
steps.content: Draw a slanted "S" with the end connected to the upper dot.

steps.title: Connect the "S" to the lower dot using a curved line.
steps.content: Connect the "S" to the lower dot using a curved line.

steps.title: Repeat similar steps for the other square to make it look symmetrical.
steps.content: Repeat similar steps for the other square to make it look symmetrical.

steps.title: Color the shape black.
steps.content: Color the shape black.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Make an outline of the face.
steps.content: Make an outline of the face. Mark the areas where you’ll put the eyes, nose and lips later using horizontal and vertical lines.

steps.title: Sketch the eyebrows, eyes and nose over the outline.
steps.content: Sketch the eyebrows, eyes and nose over the outline.

steps.title: Mark the portion where you will be sketching the lips and mustache using a rectangle.
steps.content: Mark the portion where you will be sketching the lips and mustache using a rectangle.

steps.title: Draw a vertical line cutting the rectangle into two equal sides.
steps.content: Draw a vertical line cutting the rectangle into two equal sides. Add an inverted "S" on the upper right side and a curved line on the lower right side. Do similar steps on the opposite side to make it look symmetrical.

steps.title: Add details to the face like the hair, ears and clothing.
steps.content: Add details to the face like the hair, ears and clothing.

steps.title: Erase extra lines from the outline for a clean finish and color the drawing.
steps.content: Erase extra lines from the outline for a clean finish and color the drawing.

steps.title: Draw two vertical oblongs.
steps.content: Draw two vertical oblongs. The smaller oblong is at the left end.

steps.title: Draw a reflection of the drawing in step 1 and wherein the bigger oblongs overlap each other.
steps.content: Draw a reflection of the drawing in step 1 and wherein the bigger oblongs overlap each other.

steps.title: Draw the cross-sections for each shape.
steps.content: Draw the cross-sections for each shape.

steps.title: Draw the curve lines which connect the small oblongs with the bigger ones.
steps.content: Draw the curve lines which connect the small oblongs with the bigger ones.

steps.title: Draw curve lines that connect from the midpoint of the bigger ovals to the upper tip of the small ovals in both sides.
steps.content: Draw curve lines that connect from the midpoint of the bigger ovals to the upper tip of the small ovals in both sides.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary sketches.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary sketches.

steps.title: Color to your liking to resemble a mustache!
steps.content: Color to your liking to resemble a mustache!

steps.title: Draw a circle.
steps.content: Draw a circle. This will be framework for the head.

steps.title: Draw a straight line from the tip of the circle and extending down and outside it.
steps.content: Draw a straight line from the tip of the circle and extending down and outside it. Draw a rectangle which overlaps about a fourth of the circle and then a trapezoid after that.

steps.title: Draw details for the hair and ears using straight and curve lines.
steps.content: Draw details for the hair and ears using straight and curve lines.

steps.title: Draw the curve lines for the neck and shoulders.
steps.content: Draw the curve lines for the neck and shoulders.

steps.title: Draw details for the man’s face – eyes, nose, mouth, and brows.
steps.content: Draw details for the man’s face – eyes, nose, mouth, and brows.

steps.title: Draw the mustache using the curve lines.
steps.content: Draw the mustache using the curve lines.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary sketches.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary sketches. Add details of the goatee.

steps.title: Color to your liking to resemble a man with a mustache!
steps.content: Color to your liking to resemble a man with a mustache!
